content: so they alternating colors again in the foot and end become hidden do this for every stocking with the toe in ca >> if you want to do the thicker 3 stripe and that s it i hope you enjoy your garland version work the cuff in color a ca then alternate colors in the leg 4 rounds each for a total of 12 rounds work the heel as normal for the first 2 rounds of the foot work in the same color as the heel then change colors every 4 rounds for the next 12 rounds your foot will end up with 14 rounds instead of the written 12 but it s the only way to have the cuff heel and toe all the same color with 4 round stripes then work the heel in ca more free patterns ivy cardigan | glen echobaby blanket | kodiak cowl | havre cowl popular paid for patterns lofoten sweater | glymur socks | little thun baby sweater | vale beanie | banff cardigan 2021 ©the blue mouse stocking garland |the blue mouse knits
